description: Light, comfortable and packable shorts for hiking in warm climates. The Abisko Hike Shorts M are made in G-1000 Air Stretch with recycled polyester and organic cotton. Integrated belt for adjusting the waist, two zippered hand pockets and one zippered leg pocket. Lightweight and functional hiking shorts optimised for warm conditions.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Hike Shorts - Mens
